settings.title: Best Immune System Boosters
settings.text:
Did you know that maintaining adequate electrolyte levels is crucial for a healthy immune system? Electrolytes play a vital role in supporting immune cell function and hydration, which is essential for mucus production‚Äîa key defense against infections.

At Buoy, we understand the significance of electrolytes in boosting your immune system. Our electrolyte and mineral drops are specially designed to provide your body with the essential electrolytes it needs for optimal health.

‚úì How Electrolytes Boost Immunity
‚úì How Buoy Supports Immune Health
‚úì What Weakens Your Immune System
‚úì Diet and Immunity
‚úì Our Immune-Boosting Electrolyte Solution

Plus, a sneak peek of our favorite electrolytes to keep your immune system fighting fit!

settings.title: üßÇ Sodium
settings.text: Sodium isn't just for seasoning your food. It plays an indispensable role in regulating your immune cell functions and maintains a healthy water balance within cells. Proper hydration is crucial as it supports the production of mucus, our body's first line of defense against pathogens.

settings.title: üçå Potassium
settings.text: Potassium also helps manage the balance of fluids in and out of your body's cells, tissues, and organs. This fluid balance is essential for the optimal function of immune cells. Additionally, potassium aids in the transport of vital nutrients to areas that require immune support.

settings.title: ‚öñÔ∏è Chloride
settings.text: Chloride helps maintain the pH balance in bodily fluids, which is essential for your immune cells to function optimally. It also aids in digestive health by supporting the production of natural stomach acids, capable of killing harmful bacteria and parasites.

settings.title: üß¨ Magnesium
settings.text: Magnesium is essential for activating enzymes crucial for DNA repair and immune response. It also serves an anti-inflammatory purpose, helping to mitigate inflammation and in turn, support the immune system.

settings.title: üí™ Calcium
settings.text: Known for supporting healthy bones, calcium also plays a role in immune health, aiding in cell signaling between immune cells and supporting physical barriers to pathogens.

settings.title: How Electrolytes Support Immune Health
settings.text_bottom:
Electrolytes are often touted as the go-to solution for athletes or those leading an active lifestyle. But the truth is, electrolytes are essential for everyone‚Äîwhether you're pounding the pavement, working nine-to-five at a desk, or just going about your daily routine.

Far from being a fitness-only supplement, electrolytes play a vital role in maintaining a healthy immune system. Let's explore how the key electrolytes found in Buoy support your body's natural defenses.

By understanding the specific roles each electrolyte plays in immune health, you can better appreciate their importance in maintaining a well-rounded, resilient system capable of defending against numerous health challenges.

settings.title: üí¶ Hydration Drops
settings.text: The Essentials: Our Hydration Drops are your go-to daily dose of key electrolytes and 87 trace minerals, delivered in their most bioavailable form. With zero sugar, sweeteners, or artificial flavors, you can turn any drink into a hydrating powerhouse with just one squeeze.

settings.title: ‚ö° Energy Drops
settings.text: Electrolytes Plus: Take everything great about our Hydration Drops, and add a kick of natural caffeine sourced from green tea, along with antioxidants. The result? Sustained energy levels without the jitters, while still replenishing those essential electrolytes.

When stressed or feeling anxious, our muscles tense up and become rigid, which can lead to muscle cramping.

While anxiety and stress are hard to control, having plenty of electrolytes and fluids in your body allows your body to handle excess levels of cortisol better than it would without.

Poor posture and overworking muscle groups may restrict blood flow, which is a common cause of leg cramps.

Daily things like sitting too long in one spot, standing on hard and flat floors and even poor posture while standing and sitting may be a factor for leg cramps.

settings.section_title:
Buoy Immune Booster Products and Their Ingredients

When it comes to supporting your immune system, not all electrolyte drops are created equal. At Buoy, we've specially formulated our products to give your body the essential nutrients it craves for optimal health.

And you can trust that every ingredient is scientifically backed to offer real, measurable benefits. Here's a rundown of what we offer:

settings.text: "Enter Buoy hydration drops, the easy-to-use formula that‚Äôs designed to give you a big boost of the electrolytes and trace minerals that you need every day to feel your best."
‚ÄúBest electrolytes for daily use"
"It's purposefully unflavored which means sugar-free, stevia, and sweetener-free"
‚ÄúBuoy Daily Wellness Drops will be your latest obsession.‚Äù

settings.title: Sports Drink üëé
settings.text:
Despite the billions of dollars sports drinks have spent on marketing, they fall short for being a go-to electrolyte solution for daily use.

‚ùå Processed Salt ‚Äî¬†Sports drinks use cheaply manufactured sodium sources like sodium bicarbonate and sodium chloride that contain an FDA-approved amount of anti-caking agents and bleaching compounds.

‚ùå High Sugar ‚Äî¬†Excessive sugar intake mitigates effective hydration and undermines optimal electrolyte function in our bodies, leading to chronic inflammation with consistent use.

‚ùå Artificial Ingredients ‚Äî¬†Sports drinks are loaded with artificial colors, flavors and other additives that negatively impact our health, well-being and hydration.

settings.title: Electrolyte Drink üëç
settings.text:
Make an electrolyte drink at home with supplements like Buoy that are specifically formulated for hydration and muscle cramp prevention.

‚úÖ Real Sea Salt ‚Äî¬†Buoy's hand harvested sea salt is loaded with naturally-occurring electrolytes and 87 trace minerals for a robust hydration profile that stops muscle cramps in their tracks.

‚úÖ No Sugar or Sweeteners ‚Äî¬†These sweet and inflammatory ingredients work against electrolyte function in the long run.

‚úÖ All-Natural Hydration ‚Äî¬†Buoy preserves its electrolytes and minerals in their naturally ionically charged states for fast-absorption.

Elevate your drink, boost your immune system, and keep your body's defenses at their peak.

settings.text:
Why Choose?: Can't decide which Buoy drop is right for you? Why not get them all? Our Daily Wellness Bundle combines the Hydration, Energy, and Immunity Drops into one convenient package. It‚Äôs the ultimate toolkit for hydration and immune support.

So, whether you're looking to maintain hydration, amp up your energy, or fortify your immune system, Buoy has a scientifically-backed solution tailored just for you. Choose your best fit, and give your body the boost it deserves.

settings.title: Buoy Immune Booster Products and Their Ingredients
settings.subtext:
When it comes to supporting your immune system, not all electrolyte drops are created equal. At Buoy, we've specially formulated our products to give your body the essential nutrients it craves for optimal health.

And you can trust that every ingredient is scientifically backed to offer real, measurable benefits. Here's a rundown of what we offer:

settings.suptext:
üò¥ Not Getting Enough Sleep

Lack of sleep can hamper the production of cytokines, proteins that are crucial in fighting off infections and inflammation. Essentially, your immune system is pulling an all-nighter without the benefit of being productive.

üò´ Chronic Stress

Stress hormones like cortisol can inhibit the functions of white blood cells, making your body an easier target for infections. It's not just mental stress, but physical stress that takes a toll as well.

üö¨ Smoking/Excessive Alcohol Consumption

Both of these vices can impair your immune system big time. Smoking affects lung health, making you more susceptible to respiratory infections, while excessive alcohol can damage immune cells in the gut.

ü•ó Nutritional Deficiencies

Lacking essential nutrients like vitamins A, C, and E can compromise your immune system. These nutrients are vital in the production and function of immune cells.

üíß Dehydration

Water is essential for the production of lymph, a fluid that circulates white blood cells and nutrients. Without adequate hydration, the lymphatic system can't do its job, leading to a weaker immune system.

üçî Obesity

Higher body fat can lead to increased inflammation, which in turn can impede the function of white blood cells. It's a slippery slope from there to reduced immunity.

üíä Certain Medications

Certain medications, like immunosuppressants, can also weaken your defenses. While they're crucial for treating conditions like autoimmune diseases, they make you more susceptible to other infections as a side effect.

üëµ Ageing

As we age, our immune response capability becomes reduced, meaning older adults are more susceptible to infections.

ü¶† Diseases like HIV or Cancer

These conditions severely compromise the immune system, making the body much less effective at fighting off other diseases.

By understanding these factors, you can take proactive measures to strengthen your immune system and keep it in fighting form.

settings.title: Easily incorporate electrolytes into your routine

settings.title: The Relationship Between Diet and Your Immune System
settings.text:
Food is more than just fuel‚Äîit's the building block of your immune system. A balanced, nutrient-rich diet is your body's first line of defense against pathogens and viruses. Here's how:

üçä Key Vitamins and Minerals

Vitamin C, Zinc, and Selenium are power players when it comes to immune health. They're essential for the production and function of white blood cells and antibodies, keeping you ready to fend off any invaders.

üçó Lean Protein

Lean protein sources like chicken, turkey, and fish offer the amino acids your immune cells need to repair and multiply. Without enough protein, your immune system won't have the resources to fight back.

üå± Probiotics

A healthy gut translates to a robust immune system. Probiotics found in yogurt, kombucha, and fermented foods help maintain a healthy balance of gut bacteria, which is a cornerstone for immune health.

üí¶ Hydration

Hydration is a game-changer for your lymphatic system, which directly impacts immune cell function. Keeping your body hydrated ensures the lymphatic system can do its job‚Äîtransporting immune cells throughout your body.

ü•¶ Fruits and Vegetables

Never underestimate the power of fruits and veggies. High in antioxidants and phytonutrients, these foods counteract oxidative stress, which can weaken your immune system.

‚ùå What To Avoid

Steer clear of excessive sugar, alcohol, and processed foods. They can cause inflammation and lower the function of immune cells.

üö´ Managing Allergies and Intolerances

Don't let food allergies or intolerances catch you off guard. They can weaken your immune system and make you more susceptible to other health issues.

Scientific research has consistently backed the link between nutrition and immunity. Your diet provides the raw materials that your immune system needs for optimal functioning.

So, to keep your body's defense system in top shape, focus on a balanced diet that's chock-full of nutrients. It's not just about staying fit; it's about staying resilient. üí™

settings.title: What are electrolytes and why are they important?
settings.answer:
Electrolytes are essential minerals, like sodium, potassium, chloride, magnesium, and calcium, that carry an electric charge.

They help maintain the body's fluid balance, muscle contractions, nerve impulses, and the pH level of your blood. Without the right balance of electrolytes, your body won't function properly.

settings.title: How do electrolytes help boost immunity?
settings.answer:
Electrolytes support the overall health and metabolic processes of the body. Proper hydration, aided by electrolytes, ensures that cells function efficiently, including immune cells.

Moreover, minerals like zinc play a direct role in maintaining immune function, aiding in cell growth, inflammatory response, and fighting off free radicals.

settings.title: What electrolytes does Buoy contain?
settings.answer: Buoy contains the key electrolytes sodium, potassium, chloride, magnesium, and calcium sourced from hand-harvested sea salt.

settings.title: What makes Buoy drops better than sports drinks or other electrolyte supplements?
settings.answer:
Unlike traditional sports drinks, Buoy offers electrolytes in a 3x more bioavailable form, ensuring faster and more effective absorption by the body. This means quicker hydration without the unnecessary sugars and artificial additives commonly found in many sports drinks.

Sourced from real sea salt and deep ocean minerals, Buoy not only provides essential electrolytes but also 87 trace minerals, B vitamins, and antioxidants. These contribute to a plethora of health benefits, from enhanced hydration and alleviating headaches and cramps to promoting cognitive functions and radiant skin.

With its clean and neutral taste, Buoy can seamlessly transform any drink into a hydrating beverage without altering the flavor.

settings.title: How should I use Buoy‚Äôs drops to get the immune boosting benefits?
settings.answer: While Buoy is generally safe to use, it's important to consult your healthcare provider before adding any supplement to your regimen, especially if you have certain medical conditions or are taking medications. This ensures that there are no potential interactions or adverse effects.

settings.title: When should I use Buoy‚Äôs drops - before, during, or after exercise?
settings.answer: Buoy's drops are versatile and can be used at any time‚Äîbefore, during, or after exercise. By keeping your electrolytes balanced, you'll support muscle function, hydration, and recovery.

settings.title: Are the ingredients in Buoy‚Äôs drops natural?
settings.answer: Yes, Buoy emphasizes using all-natural ingredients in its drops, ensuring you're getting the purest form of hydration without any artificial additives.

settings.title: Do Buoy drops have any side effects?
settings.answer: When used as directed, Buoy drops should not have any adverse side effects. However, as with any supplement, it's always best to consult with a healthcare professional if you have specific health concerns.

settings.title: What do Buoy drops taste like?
settings.answer: One of Buoy's unique features is its neutral taste profile. When added to your beverage, Buoy drops shouldn't change the flavor, allowing you to hydrate without compromising on taste.

settings.title: Can I drink your electrolyte drinks while pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.answer:
Yes!

Electrolytes and trace minerals are key nutrients that are essential to all cycles of pregnancy, from pre- to postpartum.

Pregnant and breastfeeding women can significantly benefit by incorporating a clean electrolyte supplement into their diets.

With any new supplement, we always recommend checking with your healthcare team or doctor.

settings.title: Can children drink your electrolyte drinks?
settings.answer:
Yes!

All Buoy electrolyte drops are safe and effective for children.

Buoy contains only essential electrolytes and trace minerals important for every cell and system in our bodies, especially key for children as these nutrients are often missing in our diets.

Other electrolytes contain high sugar and sweetener counts, artifical colors and additives and other inflammatory ingredients.

settings.title: Do your electrolyte drinks contain caffeine?
settings.answer:
Hydration Drops and Immunity Drops do not contain any caffeine.

Only our Energy Drops contain a small amount of caffeine sourced from the potent health compounds in green tea.

settings.title: How long do the effects of your electrolyte drinks last?
settings.answer:
Buoy electrolytes are a great option for short-term relief with their fast-acting, bioavailable form factor. For results within a day or two, you can help prevent leg cramps, headaches, fatigue and more.

Use consistently for transformative, long lasting benefits.

settings.title: Are your electrolyte drinks vegan?
settings.answer:
Yes!

Buoy's electrolytes and minerals are ethically sourced from the ocean and our antioxidants and vitamins are plant-powered.

Our electrolyte drops contain no animal byproduct.

settings.title: Do you offer bulk orders or subscriptions for your drinks?
settings.answer:
Yes!

If you need to stock up, 9 Bottle Packs are available for one-time purchases and subscription to save an additional 24%.

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your electrolyte drinks?
settings.answer:
Buoy electrolyte drops are shelf stable over a year.

After opening, we suggest using within two months.

Unlock 24% off Buoy when you subscribe to monthly deliveries. Your discount and Free Shipping applies to every order. Cancel anytime, even after yoru first order.

If it's not for you, get a full refund.

Yes! Buoy is nationwide in CVS, Walgreens and boutique natural grocers across the country.

Check our store locator to find the closest stores to you or order directly from our site.

Buoy offers a 30 day money back guarantee on all of our products purchased through our website so you can try it risk free in your routine to see if it's a good fit.

If it's not for you, get a full refund no questions asked.
